tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE influencer_fraud_detection (
    influencer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_name VARCHAR(255),
    followers_count INT,
    engagement_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
    suspicious_behavior BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_likes INT,
    post_comments INT
);

CREATE TABLE SuspiciousActivities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id INT,
    activity_type TEXT,
    activity_description TEXT,
    activity_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id INT,
    post_date DATE,
    post_text TEXT,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE Comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Fraudulent_Activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_description TEXT,
    activity_date TIMESTAMP
);
